lead_paragraph: Katy Perry has released a new single that marks her first new music since her smash 2013 album, "Prism."

headline.main: Katy Perry Releases 'Rise,' First New Song Since 2013
headline.print_headline: Katy Perry Releases 'Rise,' First New Song Since 2013
